---
title: Community Directory
format: html
execute:
  echo: false
---

```{r}
library(reactable)
library(htmltools)
communities <- read.csv("communities.csv")
reactable(
  communities,
  filterable = TRUE,
  defaultPageSize = 10,
  bordered = TRUE,
  highlight = TRUE,
  columns = list(
    Website = colDef(cell = JS("function(cellInfo) {
      return `<a href='${cellInfo.value}' target='_blank'>${cellInfo.value}</a>`;
    }"))
  )
)
